catalog_script_client.name: cargarModificarCamposBCRServiceGroup

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_7cd2270d4f223300c09fb8de9310c70e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:212cbfb34f163300c09fb8de9310c78f</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>cargarModificarCamposBCRServiceGroup</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		return;
	}
	
	//Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	var valor_Modificar = g_form.getValue('servicegroup_a_modificar');
	if(valor_Modificar != '-- NINGUNA --'){
		g_form.setReadOnly('nombre_del_servicegroup',true);
		//el nombre lo bloqueo setReadOnly
		
		//cargo el JSON con el nombre del serviceGroup
		
		//luego extraigo variables del form con el json
		
		//envio la peticion
		
		// setRead Only nombre serviceGrouyp
		var ga = new GlideAjax('MostrarModificarServiceGroupBCR30');
		ga.addParam("sysparm_name", "listarSG");
		ga.addParam('sysparm_JSON_data',valor_Modificar);
		ga.getXML(getResponse);
	}
	
	function getResponse(response) {
		
		var values = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
		
		var valor = values.split(',');
		
		var serviceGroupname = valor[0];
		var tipoProtocolo = valor[1];
		var cacheType = valor[3];
		
		//options
		
		
		var cacheable = valor[4];
		var healthMonitoring = valor[5];
		var state = valor[6];
		var AppFlowLogging = valor[7];
		
		
		//agrego a los campos el dato
		g_form.setValue('nombre_del_servicegroup', valor[0]);
		g_form.setValue('tipo_de_protoc_lo', valor[1]);
		g_form.setValue('cache_type', valor[3]);
		
		//options checkBox
		g_form.setValue('cacheable', false);
		g_form.setValue('health_monitoring', true);
		g_form.setValue('state', true);
		g_form.setValue('appflow_logging', true);

	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-07-08 16:31:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7cd2270d4f223300c09fb8de9310c70e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>cargarModificarCamposBCRServiceGroup</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="BCR_APP" source="x_287988_bcr_app">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="BCR_APP">28f3b438db33230087d9d6aa48961993</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_7cd2270d4f223300c09fb8de9310c70e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>701980296</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-10 15:20:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
